name: Regnium Alpha
description: A vairant of Regnium, more radioactive, more lethal, and more resistant.
details: Occupied for the majority of turrets and buildings of the corerupted faction, being a strong variant, it corrupts the units it thouches and reddering them useless. this variant has evolved into Serpulo this variant affects the planetary surface of the Endlevour to a greater extend.
